name: Senna Super Car: Speed Drifter
description:
Drive Super Car with Real Drifting Physics. In all over the world most car lovers wants the best models of luxury sports cars. The wait is over Senna Super Car: Speed Drifter is the best car driving game with high quality super cars models including Volkswagen Golf and much more which can be purchased by in game coins. Enjoy Day & Night cycle with huge open world environment and perform speed drift in city.

Enjoy multiple features by selecting in map. Play in racing mode & enter in parking mania to park the car. Number of vehicles available in garage. Select one & start mission.Now time to enjoy the city drifting simulator with Range Senna Super Car to improve your racing and drifting skills. Because now you can enjoy racing, drifting parking, stunt jumping & check points with speed drifter racer in Senna Super Car: Speed Drifter.

Features:

- All tuning options available
- Accelerator and touch steering
- Animation of the profound smoke
- Off-road Curvy Tracks for high powered
